recycle.config.auto_clean_time.tooltip: How often the mod automatically cleans up dropped items. Default: 300 seconds (5 minutes)
recycle.config.show_cleanup_warnings.too: Whether to show warning messages before cleaning up items (60s, 30s, 10s countdown)
recycle.config.warning_60s_message.toolt: Message displayed 60 seconds before cleanup. Use color codes like §e for yellow
recycle.config.warning_30s_message.toolt: Message displayed 30 seconds before cleanup. Use color codes like §6 for gold
recycle.config.warning_10s_message.toolt: Message displayed 10 seconds before cleanup. Use color codes like §c for red
recycle.config.warning_countdown_message: Message for final 10-second countdown. Use {time} to show remaining seconds
Message shown after cleanup finishes. Use {count} to show number of items cleaned
recycle.config.trash_box_size.tooltip: Number of slots in each trash box. Larger sizes allow more items to be stored
recycle.config.global_trash_allow_put_in: Allow players to put their own items into the global trash box
Allow players to put their own items into the local trash box
recycle.config.local_trash_range.tooltip: How many chunks around the player to include in the local trash box
recycle.config.payment_item_type.tooltip: What item players need to pay to take items from global trash box
recycle.config.payment_cost_amount.toolt: How many payment items needed to take out up to 64 items at once
recycle.config.only_clean_listed_items.t: If enabled, only items in the 'Always Clean' list will be cleaned. If disabled, everything except 'Never Clean' items will be cleaned
recycle.config.always_clean_items.toolti: List of items that will always be cleaned up (when 'Only Clean Listed Items' is enabled)
recycle.config.never_clean_items.tooltip: List of items that will never be cleaned up, regardless of other settings
recycle.config.max_items_per_second.tool: Maximum number of items to process each second to prevent server lag
recycle.config.area_scan_size.tooltip: How many chunks to scan at once during cleanup
recycle.config.too_many_items_warning_li: Show warning when an area has more than this many dropped items
recycle.config.auto_stop_chunk_loading.t: Automatically disable chunk loading in areas with too many items
